content: **set comprise drops ridge knit kitchen hand towel with loop in bomull-lin crochet bread basket in bomull-lin and cotton viscose and ridge knit pot holder with loop in ice or bomull-lin ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the provence kitchen towel pattern here 1 see the provence kitchen pot holder pattern here 2 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **materials** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio 100 g colour no 02 off white or 03 linnen and use drops cotton viscose 100 g colour no 02 off white or colour no 17 light beige drops crochet hook size 4 mm / us g/6 - or the crochet hook you need to make 15 single_crochet us in width and 16 row in height with 1 thread of each yarn quality = 4 x 4 pattern links us version 3 uk version 4 french version 5 german version 6 finnish version 7 dutch version 8 norwegian version 9 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/107-30-b---provence-kitchen-hand-towel 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/107-30-c---provence-kitchen-pot-holder 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=30&lang=us 4 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=30&lang=en 5 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=30&lang=fr 6 http //www garnstudio com/lang/de/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=30&lang=de 7 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fi/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=30&lang=fi 8 http //www garnstudio com/lang/nl/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=30&lang=nl 9 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=107&d_id=30&lang=no
